variants.Description in input context: This variant results in a premature stop codon, causing a truncated protein.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the SH-SY5Y cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: No full-length PARK2 protein was detected for the variant NM_006103.4:c.289T>A.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Full-length PARK2 protein expression greater than 80% on day 7.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: No full-length PARK2 protein detected on day 7.
